Footer.description: We build modern web and app solutions for businesses that want to grow digitally.

Hero.title: We build modern web & app solutions for businesses that want to grow digitally.
Hero.subtitle: Craftcodex helps startups, small businesses, and individuals take their ideas from sketch to finished product – websites, apps, and custom systems.

ValueProposition.title: Why Choose Craftcodex?
ValueProposition.subtitle: We are a small team of developers who are passionate about building great products.
ValueProposition.card1_description: From idea, design, and backend to hosting & support.
ValueProposition.card2_description: React, Next.js, Java, Spring, Flutter, etc.
ValueProposition.card3_description: You talk directly to the developers, no middlemen.

Services.title: What we help you with
Services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of services to help you build your product.
Services.service1_description: Corporate sites, booking systems, dashboards, e-commerce.
Services.service2_description: Flutter / React Native, integrated with existing systems.
Services.service4_description: We help you with a scalable and secure infrastructure.

Process.title: How it works
Process.subtitle: Our process is simple and transparent.
Process.step1_description: We listen to your idea and needs.
Process.step2_description: We develop a solution, timeline, and price.
Process.step3_description: We build, and you see partial results.
Process.step4_description: We help deploy and provide aftercare.

Portfolio.title: Projects we are proud of
Portfolio.subtitle: Here are some of the projects we have worked on.

Portfolio.project1_description: Web app for booking, customer management, and admin panel.
Portfolio.project2_description: Dashboard with real-time data, graphs, and role-based login.
Portfolio.project3_description: Mobile app for news, push notifications, member profiles, and login.

Team.title: The Team Behind Craftcodex
Team.subtitle: We are a small team of passionate developers.

Cta.title: Ready to take the next step with your idea?
Cta.subtitle: Briefly tell us what you want to build, and we'll quickly get back to you with a proposal.

About.title: About Craftcodex
About.intro: We are two developers who believe in simplicity, quality, and honesty in every line of code. Craftcodex was born out of a desire to build software that makes a difference — not just technically impressive, but genuinely solves problems.
About.vision_description: We want to be a partner that makes technology accessible, understandable, and useful. For us, development is not about stacking buzzwords, but about building solutions that last, are secure, and can grow with you.
About.process_description: At Craftcodex, we combine business understanding with technical expertise. We believe in close dialogue, clarity, and responsibility. You talk directly to us who build your solution — no middlemen, no surprises.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.intro: We help you go from idea to finished solution—whether it's a simple website, a mobile app, or a custom system. Here's an overview of what we can help you with.

service1.title: Websites & Web Apps
service1.description: We build modern, responsive websites and web apps that work just as well on mobile as on desktop. Everything from informational sites and landing pages to booking systems, portals, and dashboards.

service2.title: Mobile Apps for iOS & Android
service2.description: We develop mobile apps with React Native or Flutter, adapted for both iOS and Android. We can connect the app to existing systems, payment solutions, or APIs.

service3.title: Custom Systems & Integrations
service3.description: When standard solutions are not enough, we build systems that are adapted to your processes. This can be internal tools, dashboards, booking flows, e-commerce, or integrations between different systems.

service4.title: Hosting, Operation & Support
service4.description: We can take care of the operating environment, monitoring, updates, and troubleshooting. With Docker and modern cloud solutions, we ensure that your app or website is fast, secure, and accessible.

service5.title: Consultation & Further Development
service5.description: Do you already have a system or a website that needs to be updated, optimized, or further developed? We can step in as a development partner, do a code review, or take responsibility for further development.

PortfolioPage.title: Our Portfolio
PortfolioPage.intro: Here is a selection of client projects, demo projects, and internal MVPs we have built. a mix of web apps, mobile solutions, and custom systems.

project1.title: Booking portal for a service company
project1.description: Web app for booking, customer management, and admin panel.
project1.stack: React, Next.js, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Tailwind, Docker

project2.title: KPI dashboard for internal monitoring
project2.description: Dashboard with real-time data, graphs, and role-based login.

project3.title: Community app for members
project3.description: Mobile app for news, push notifications, member profiles, and login.

project4.title: Portfolio site for a creator
project4.description: Simple but stylish personal website with a project gallery and contact.

ContactPage.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
ContactPage.subtitle: Tell us about your project, and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
ContactPage.message_placeholder: Describe your goals, timeline, and any specific requirements.

Technologies.title: Technologies We Use
Technologies.subtitle: We work with a modern and flexible tech stack to build the best possible solutions.

Testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.subtitle: We are proud to have worked with amazing clients. Here's what some of them have to say about us.
Testimonials.testimonial1_quote: Craftcodex delivered a fantastic product. The communication was excellent, and the result exceeded our expectations.
Testimonials.testimonial2_quote: The team at Craftcodex is incredibly skilled and professional. They are a pleasure to work with.
Testimonials.testimonial3_quote: We are very happy with the result. Craftcodex is a reliable and competent partner.
